person.note: Lu(1) Gongzhu [1314] Yuanyou coalition. Yijian's [8100] third son, Gongzhuo's [7304] and Gongbi's [1316] younger brother, Gongru's [1315] elder brother, Xizhe's [7052], Xichun's [1304] and Xiji's [1305] father, Xidao's [1306] and Xijie's [7303] uncle, Haowen's [8099] grandfather. Lu(2) Junkuang's [1279] brother-in-law, Fan(2) Zuyu's [7026], Yang(2) Huaibao's [2006] and Shao(2) Chi's [1432] father-in-law. Affinal relation of Yang(2) Guobao [7098], Zhang(1) Ciyuan [7016], Han(1) Zongyan [664], Hu(1) Zongyan [832], and Ma(2) Zhuanzheng [3665]. Wang(2) Gongchen's [1847] son-in-law, Lu(9) Xiya [3648], had the same generational name as his nephews. Li(2) Zhi(1)'s [996] patron. Lu(9) Peiwen [1318] and Tingwen [1325] had the generational name of his grandsons and grandnephews. He once recommended Sun(1) Pu [1538] for an institute assignment. XCB, 204.9b, 359.14b, 408.19b, 410.7a, 413.11a-14b; SS, 336.16b; Du Dagui, 'xia,' 10.1a. CBD, 2, 1195-1198.

入元祐黨籍者政治奧援

desc.label: 歷湖北轉運判官 元祐間入為尚書度支郎 與司馬光、呂公著諸人善 蔡卞用事 斥為黨人
元豐八年行文成都府 依樣織造錦緊絲鹿胎 為呂公著奏罷 徽宗即位 以共承翊衛進二官
琦第四子 好學有文 呂公著嘗欲薦除館職 累官至徽猷閣直學士

desc.label: 除密州推官 修潔自重 為歐陽修、呂公著所知 歷知太常禮院 與王安石厚
妙悟神契 多所自得 富弼、司馬光、呂公著退居洛中 恆相從遊 為市園宅
